titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I presided at a meeting of the chapter. There was little business and no quarrelling, so that we were out of the Chapter House shortly after noon. I lunched with Lillingston & his family: then attended Evensong in the Cathedral, & walked with 'Logic'. Finally, wrote letters & made notes.
